4701:
You seem so young
I didn't notice how fast
Those things would come to you.

You seem so fast
I didn't even notice how slow
Those things should come to you.

And you changed
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Hold me close to you
Dance with me now
Feel me smile, feel my smile
Hold me close to you

I will try to love more
Often
I will learn
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

I'm sorry but I can't tell you anything
You'll have to figure it out alone
I didn't write that one to be explained
I only wrote just what came out

I'm sorry
I'm sorry
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Turn out the light, and close your eyes
And hold me next to you
Dream of my smile, sense of my voice
And feel my blood rush through

My arms and my legs, my hands and my toes
My feet, my fingers too
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

I can't explain
Everyone keeps saying
The same thing
You must be sad

I guess I'll tell you
It's not the same thing
It took a while but I'm doing OK
We played a long time
We got a long fine
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Crying baby
Crying mother
That's what I am

Fading softly
Slowly fading
Shaped (or shake?) to steady my hands

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Everyday with You, Lord
Is sweeter than the day before
Everyday with You, Lord
Is sweeter than the day before
Every morning' I will worship, every evenin' I'll adore
'Cause every day with You is sweeter,
sweeter than the day before.


What a privilege to know You
Like I know You
To be loved like You love me
What an honor to worship
Truly worship
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

didn't mean to wake you up
guess I couldn't sleep
tried to sleep out on the couch
but that's not where I want to be

and I'm so tired
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

I want to to be a good mother
But I don't know if I am
I wanta be like no other
Kind of mother, if I can

(1409613209382)

No one else can annoy me like you

No one else can hold me like you do
